# cm014 - November 15, 2018

## Overview

* Define parametric inference and identify use cases
* Define maximum likelihood estimation (MLE)
* Review the properties of the maximum likelihood estimator
* Demonstrate MLE for basic estimators
* Identify how to computationally estimate the maximum likelihood estimator

## Before class

* Read [chapter 9 (Parametric inference) in *All of Statistics*](https://link-springer-com.proxy.uchicago.edu/book/10.1007%2F978-0-387-21736-9) (UChicago authentication required)
